about_the_game:
WORLD END ECONOMiCA Complete Soundtrack contains the complete soundtrack for the WORLD END ECONOMiCA trilogy.

Spread across 4 Discs for a total of 96 tracks, the soundtrack features all the music from each game including the opening themes performed by Kishida Kyoudan & the Akeboshi Rockets and the ending themes performed by Kiyono. The soundtrack is available in both MP3 and FLAC formats.

Soundtrack Composed by: Matsumoto Fuminori, Saadai
Disc 1, Track 30 composed by Eric Satie
Disc 2, Track 31 composed by Ludwig Van Beethoven

WEE OP Themes (Disc 4, Track 89, 91, 93, 95)
Performed by: Kishida Kyoudan & the Akeboshi Rockets

WEE ED Themes (Disc 4, Track 90, 92, 94, 96)
Composed by: -PF AUDIO-
Vocal: kiyono

Spicy Tails is a development group lead by Isuna Hasekura, author of the popular "Spice and Wolf" series as well as the manga series "Billionaire Girl." The World End Economica series of visual novels were brought to the West via Kickstarter as a joint project between Spicy Tails and Sekai Project.

short_description: Complete soundtrack to all three episodes of WORLD END ECONOMiCA. Spread across 4 discs and 96 tracks, this soundtrack features many memorable songs including the opening and ending themes.
